item.title: How I Built My Minimal Blog Website
item.description:
Creating a blog from scratch isn’t just about putting up posts — it’s about building a space that feels like you. One that’s easy to maintain, fast to load, SEO-friendly, and aesthetic enough that you’re proud to share it.

This is a detailed breakdown of how I built my own personal blog, from a blank screen to a deployed site — and every hurdle I crossed along the way.
